title: I need to be banned
body:
Hi Riot,

Recently my game has been running smoothly all day and then the moment I decide I want to play with 4 friends, my pc just decides to die because of league and league then uninstalls the latest version and needs to be re-patched. This has happened at least 3 times now so just do us all a favour and **ban **my account

Thank You.

replies.body:
Update: It just happened again today, twice trying to load into the same game. 
Please proceed with the banning ASAP.
